In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful! The total of the produce of the harvest of Abû Ṣalâba:
| artabas |
kidney-beans | 158 | barley | 118 1/2
wheat | 50 | of wheat
| | viz. what has come to Ibrahîm | 80 1/2
and of lentils | 4 1/6 | Thus the total of that which has resulted, of wheat 130 artabas.
